searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT I.BA_NAME, I.QJDS_NAME, I.GRP_NAME, I.AGENT_NAME, I.AGENT_PHONE, C.DISTRICT_ID, (SELECT TOP 1 VJ.REAL_NAME FROM SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB VJ LEFT JOIN SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AHT ON AHT.ASSIGNEE_=VJ.USERNAME WHERE AHT.TASK_DEF_KEY_ ='GUOHU' AND AHT.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE) GUOHU_REAL_NAME, C.PKID, C.CASE_CODE, C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID, C.CTM_CODE, C.ORG_ID, M.CUST_NAME, M.CUST_CODE, I.AR_NAME, I.GRP_CODE, I.AR_NAME, W.INST_CODE, M.CUST_NAME, M.FIN_ORG_CODE, ROUND(CONVERT(FLOAT,M.COM_AMOUNT)/10000,2) COM_AMOUNT, ROUND(CONVERT(FLOAT,M.PRF_AMOUNT)/10000,2) PRF_AMOUNT, M.COM_DISCOUNT, ROUND(CONVERT(FLOAT,(M.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT))/10000,2) ACCOUNT, M.MORT_TYPE, M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI, C.LOAN_REQ, M.loanlost_apply_reason as loanlost_apply_reason_old, M.SELF_DEL_REASON, HT. USE_CARD_PAY, HT.CARD_PAY_AMOUNT, (SELECT TOP 1 AT.END_TIME_ FROM SCTRANS.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_='Guohu' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=W.INST_CODE ORDER BY AT.END_TIME_ DESC) TRANSFERDATE, (SELECT TOP 1 AT.END_TIME_ FROM SCTRANS.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_='GuohuApprove' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_= W.INST_CODE ORDER BY AT.END_TIME_ DESC) CASETRANSFERDATE, V.LONG_ AS status, (SELECT TOP 1 U.REAL_NAME FROM SCTRANS.SYS_USER U WHERE U.ID=(SELECT TOP 1 OPERATOR from SCTRANS.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar1 WHERE ar1.PART_CODE='GuohuApprove' and ar1.CASE_CODE=C.CASE_CODE ORDER BY ar1.OPERATOR_TIME DESC)) AS ASSESSOR,
(SELECT TOP 1 ar2.CONTENT FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar2 WHERE ar2.PART_CODE='GuohuApprove' AND ar2.CASE_CODE=C.CASE_CODE ORDER BY ar2.OPERATOR_TIME DESC) AS CONTENT, (SELECT TOP 1 ar3.NOT_APPROVE FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar3 WHERE ar3.PART_CODE='GuohuApprove' AND ar3.CASE_CODE=C.CASE_CODE ORDER BY ar3.OPERATOR_TIME DESC) AS NOT_APPROVE, (SELECT SUM(EC.APPLY_AMOUNT) FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE EC WHERE EC.CASE_CODE = C.CASE_CODE AND EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE NOT IN ('30004005','30004015')) ELOAN_APPLYAMOUNT_COUNT
FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C INNER JOIN SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE_INFO I ON C.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN SCTRANS.T_TO_WORKFLOW W ON C.CASE_CODE = W.CASE_CODE AND W.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND W.STATUS IN (0, 4) INNER JOIN SCTRANS.ACT_HI_VARINST V ON V.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE AND V.NAME_='GuohuApprove' LEFT JOIN SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M ON C.CASE_CODE = M.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND M.LAST_LOAN_BANK IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER HT ON W.CASE_CODE=HT.CASE_CODE where 1=1 <if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr !='' "> AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO P WHERE C.CASE_CODE = P.CASE_CODE AND P.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%') </if>
<if test="orgName != null and orgName != '' "> AND C.ORG_ID = #orgName# </if> <if test="caseCode != null and caseCode != ''"> AND C.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </if> <if test="vrealName != null and vrealName != ''"> AND I.QJDS_NAME LIKE '%' + #vrealName# + '%' </if> <if test="managerName != null and managerName != ''"> AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB_ACTIVE UA WHERE UA.USER_ID = #managerName# AND JOB_CODE = 'Manager' AND UA.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID) </if> <if test="TransferStatus != null and TransferStatus != ''"> AND V.LONG_ = #TransferStatus# </if> <if test="(transferDateStart != null and transferDateStart != '') or (transferDateEnd != null and transferDateEnd != '')"> AND EXISTS(
SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_='Guohu' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_= W.INST_CODE <if test="transferDateStart != null and transferDateStart != '' "> AND AT.END_TIME_ >= #transferDateStart# </if> <if test="transferDateEnd != null and transferDateEnd != '' "> AND AT.END_TIME_ <= #transferDateEnd# </if> AND AT.ID_=( SELECT MAX(ID_) FROM SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AT2 WHERE AT2.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE AND AT2.TASK_DEF_KEY_='Guohu' )
) </if> <if test="(caseTransferDateStart != null and caseTransferDateStart != '') or (caseTransferDateEnd != null and caseTransferDateEnd != '')"> AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_='GuohuApprove' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_= W.INST_CODE <if test="caseTransferDateStart != null and caseTransferDateStart != '' "> AND AT.END_TIME_ >= #caseTransferDateStart# </if> <if test="caseTransferDateEnd != null and caseTransferDateEnd != '' "> AND AT.END_TIME_ <= #caseTransferDateEnd# </if> AND AT.ID_=( SELECT MAX(ID_) FROM SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AT2 WHERE AT2.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE AND AT2.TASK_DEF_KEY_='GuohuApprove' ) ) </if> <if test="jobCode != 'consultant'"> and exists(select 1 from SCTRANS.V_YUCUI_ORG_HIERARCHY VYOH where VYOH.ORG_ID =c.ORG_ID and VYOH.TEAM_ID=#orgId# or VYOH.DISTRICT_ID=#orgId# or VYOH.hq_id=#orgId#) </if> <if test="jobCode == 'consultant'"> C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID=#userId# </if>

column.name: GUOHUDJ,DISTNAME,PROPERTY_ADDR,CON_PRICE,REAL_HT_TIME,EVAL_FEE
column.title: 过户单价,过户区域,产证地址,合同价（万元）,实际过户时间,评估费

column.name: USE_CARD_PAY
column.title: 是否刷卡（税费卡/佣金卡）

column.name: ELOAN_APPLYAMOUNT_COUNT
column.title: E+金融产品申请总金额(万元)

searchSql.baseSql: SELECT org_name as ORGNAME,AMOUNT,NOT_APPROVE,(AMOUNT-NOT_APPROVE) APPROVE, (CASE WHEN AMOUNT>0 THEN CONCAT(NOT_APPROVE*100/AMOUNT,'%') ELSE '0%' END) RATE FROM ( SELECT org.org_name,COUNT(ar.PKID) AMOUNT,COUNT((CASE WHEN CONTENT LIKE '不通过,%' THEN 1 ELSE null end)) NOT_APPROVE FROM sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE c ON ar.CASE_CODE = c.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_ORG org ON c.ORG_ID = org.id WHERE ar.PART_CODE = 'GuohuApprove' <ifNotNull serviceDepId> AND c.ORG_ID =#serviceDepId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull startDate> AND ar.OPERATOR_TIME >=#startDate# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull endDate> AND ar.OPERATOR_TIME <#endDate# </ifNotNull> GROUP BY org.org_name ) t2

SELECT org_name as ORGNAME,AMOUNT,NOT_APPROVE,(AMOUNT-NOT_APPROVE) APPROVE, (CASE WHEN AMOUNT>0 THEN CONCAT(NOT_APPROVE*100/AMOUNT,'%') ELSE '0%' END) RATE FROM ( SELECT org.org_name,COUNT(ar.PKID) AMOUNT,COUNT((CASE WHEN CONTENT LIKE '不通过,%' THEN 1 ELSE null end)) NOT_APPROVE FROM sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE c ON ar.CASE_CODE = c.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_ORG org ON c.DISTRICT_ID = org.id WHERE ar.PART_CODE = 'GuohuApprove' <ifNotNull serviceDepId> AND c.DISTRICT_ID =#serviceDepId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull startDate> AND ar.OPERATOR_TIME >=#startDate# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull endDate> AND ar.OPERATOR_TIME <#endDate# </ifNotNull> GROUP BY org.org_name ) t2 where ORG_NAME is not null

SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(j.ORG_NAME) = 1 THEN '合计' ELSE j.ORG_NAME end as orgName, sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE 'reason1,%' OR NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%,reason1,%' OR NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason1 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason2%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason2 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason3%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason3 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason4%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason4 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason5%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason5 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason6%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason6 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason7%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason7 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason8%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason8 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason9%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason9 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason10%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason10 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason11%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason11 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason12%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason12 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason13%' OR NOT_APPROVE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason13 FROM sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD t left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE c on t.CASE_CODE=c.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.SYS_ORG j on c.ORG_ID=j.ID WHERE CONTENT LIKE '不通过,%' AND PART_CODE = 'GuohuApprove' <ifNotNull serviceDepId> AND c.ORG_ID =#serviceDepId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull startDate> AND OPERATOR_TIME >=#startDate# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull endDate> AND OPERATOR_TIME <#endDate# </ifNotNull>

column.name: reason8
column.title: 贷款情况有误（有贷款、无贷款）

column.name: reason9
column.title: 贷款类型未选择/有误（纯商贷、组合贷、纯公积金）

column.name: reason10
column.title: 附件照片缺少/有误（物业地址不符、模糊不清、缺少重要附件）

searchSql.baseSql: SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(j.ORG_NAME) = 1 THEN '合计' ELSE j.ORG_NAME end as orgName, sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE 'reason1,%' OR NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%,reason1,%' OR NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason1 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason2%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason2 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason3%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason3 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason4%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason4 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason5%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason5 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason6%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason6 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason7%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason7 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason8%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason8 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason9%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason9 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason10%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason10 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason11%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason11 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason12%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason12 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason13%' OR NOT_APPROVE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason13 FROM sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD t left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE c on t.CASE_CODE=c.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.SYS_ORG j on c.DISTRICT_ID=j.ID WHERE CONTENT LIKE '不通过,%' AND PART_CODE = 'GuohuApprove' <ifNotNull serviceDepId> AND c.DISTRICT_ID =#serviceDepId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull startDate> AND OPERATOR_TIME >=#startDate# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull endDate> AND OPERATOR_TIME <#endDate# </ifNotNull> and c.DISTRICT_ID is not null

column.name: reason8
column.title: 贷款情况有误（有贷款、无贷款）

column.name: reason9

column.name: reason10
column.title: 附件照片缺少/有误（物业地址不符、模糊不清、缺少重要附件）

column.name: reason2
column.title: 客户资质差、征信有问题

column.name: reason3
column.title: 客户亲戚、朋友在银行上班

column.name: reason5
column.title: 客户自己找的银行优惠折扣大

column.name: reason6
column.title: 客户不愿意支付评估费

column.name: reason8
column.title: 房东坚持客户到他指定银行办理

column.name: reason9
column.title: 房龄老、面积小等不予受理案件

column.name: reason12
column.title: 分行原因导致案件流失
